description: This file defines a Clock class that provides an abstraction over the system's DateTime.now() method. It allows for injecting custom 'now' functions during testing or debugging, enabling time manipulation in a controlled manner.

classes.name: Clock
classes.description: A lightweight clock abstraction that allows overriding the current time for testing or debugging purposes. Provides static methods to get and set the 'now' function.

methods.name: now
methods.description: Returns the current time, which can be overridden for testing purposes.

methods.name: setNow
methods.description: Overrides the clock's now() function with a custom implementation, or resets it to the system's current time if null is passed.
